name: ModuShip
description:
(close the debug command line at the bottom of the game, I couldn't make it run on itch without that for some reason :/)

Made in ~12h for the GMTK GameJam in 2021.

Lost in space, you use a modular spaceship to survive. Between each alien wave, you can buy, sell, and stick together parts of your ship with different purposes. 

[CONTROLS]

~WASD / ZQSD movement for navigation tool and player character.

~LEFT SHIFT to start/stop using tool.

~SPACE to jump, shoot, heal.

~MOUSE to aim with the gun tool

During the buy phase, the number at the bottom is the money you have. You can right click on a cell to sell it and gains its points to buy other cells. The text on the left indicates the particularities of the cell, its health points and its value. (Sometimes even after you bought a cell, it goes back to it's original place, but don't worry you have it, you just nee to place it very carefully).
